original_text: And all the people that were in Ai were called together to pursue after them: and they pursued after Joshua, and were drawn away from the city.
korean_text: 그 성읍에 있는 모든 백성이 그들을 추격하려고 모여 여호수아를 추격하며 유인함을 받아 아이 성읍을 멀리 떠나니

sentences.original_text: And all the people that were in Ai
were called together to pursue after them
and were drawn away from the city
